services.title: House-to-House Moving
services.summary: Our expert crews merge packing engineering, floor permits and insurance workflows into a single project plan to move every belonging safely.

services.title: Office & Workplace Relocation
services.summary: Purpose-built protocols move all electronics, archives, servers and furniture under strict security procedures for corporate clients.

services.title: Safe Relocation
services.summary: Transporting steel safes demands dedicated analysis of weight, building endurance and security protocols.

services.title: Pre-Move Survey
services.summary: Our free survey crew documents the type, weight, volume and fragility of every item before moving day.

services.title: Core Logistics Support
services.summary: Centralised storage, dispatch coordination, routing and operations support for every shipment.

services.title: Professional Packing
services.summary: Safety starts with the right materials and methods tailored to each category of belongings.

services.title: External Lift Service
services.summary: Our modular facade lift keeps high-rise moves fast, safe and independent of narrow stairwells or elevators.

services.title: Project Transport
services.summary: We handle heavy loads, factory equipment, machinery and oversized cargo through engineering-led project transport.

hero.title: Trusted Moving Experience From Ankara Across Turkey
hero.subtitle: Since 1994, we've been delivering quality service with years of experience and expertise. Our modern fleet and experienced team stand by your side at every stage of your move.

who.title: Our Company Story
who.body: Lüks Berlin Evden Eve Nakliyat was founded in Istanbul in 1994 to deliver quality service to our valued customers with years of experience and expertise. With our modern vehicle fleet and experienced management team alongside our skilled field personnel, Lüks Berlin offers city-wide and intercity moving services for homes, offices, workplaces and special valuable items, as well as state-of-the-art secure storage services to safely preserve your belongings. In today's conditions, many people move frequently within or between cities due to living conditions or work requirements. During this process, our professional moving companies provide great convenience to people who face challenges due to work intensity and stress during this difficult relocation process. As a company, we have made it our principle to work with a success-oriented approach that satisfies our customers at every stage of moving. Our respectful, careful and meticulous staff never compromises on quality while offering economical service. Since its establishment, Lüks Berlin Nakliyat Company has been following the technological innovations brought by the modern era in the field of transportation, aiming to provide flawless service with the experience and knowledge gained over the years.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: Since its establishment, Lüks Berlin Nakliyat Company aims to provide flawless service by following the technological innovations brought by the modern era in transportation, with the experience and knowledge gained over the years.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: To work with a success-oriented approach that satisfies our customers at every stage of moving, with our respectful, careful and meticulous staff, never compromising on quality while offering economical service.

testimonials.text: They handled our lift-assisted move right on time and without any hassle. Definitely recommended.
testimonials.name: Metin A.

testimonials.text: We moved from Batıkent to Elmadağ. Packing, lift setup, dismantling and delivery were flawless and faster than we expected.
testimonials.name: İbrahim E.

testimonials.text: From the initial survey to move day the whole team stayed professional and moved my home without stress.
testimonials.name: Özgür Ş.

testimonials.text: They boxed everything from the kitchen to the wardrobes in no time. Super clean and careful crew.
testimonials.name: Nurgül Kayhan K.

testimonials.text: Great crew. Packing, assembly, planning—done by people who know their job, so I didn’t need to interfere.
testimonials.name: Nurullah Can C.

testimonials.text: Smooth, tidy service from start to finish. Thank you.
testimonials.name: Özkan Y.

testimonials.text: Onur Bey and the crew packed, dismantled and reinstalled everything with zero damage. Couldn’t ask for better.
testimonials.name: Onur B.

testimonials.text: Met them via Armut. Every item was wrapped with care; real professionals I would recommend to anyone.
testimonials.name: Cemali B.

privacy.title: Privacy Notice
body: We only use the contact details you share to prepare quotes and keep you informed about your relocation.
Your data is never sold to third parties; it is shared only when required by law or to deliver the service you request.

terms.title: Terms of Use
body: All information on this site is for guidance; final pricing and planning are confirmed once we review your project details.
By using our pages you accept our cookie policy and confirm that the information you submit through the contact form is accurate.
